<img src='https://www.lifewatch.be/code/images/lwde_mvb.png' class='rightimg'/>

Hydrometeo data collected at stations along the Belgian coast and off-shore along the Flemish Banks.
- Partners : MDK,VLIZ
- Period : since 2001-09-01
- Citation: VA MDK - afdeling Kust - Meetnet Vlaamse Banken
- Registration and login required for most parameters.

[[IMIS metadata record]](https://www.vliz.be/en/imis?module=dataset&dasid=59)
